entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
